resources.string: Disable the popup usually displayed when uploading a previously taken photo

The upload feature only works with photos that have location tags attached. To ensure this works, enable location tags in the settings of your camera app and have location services enabled when taking photos.
Please provide a title and description for the spot
The photo selected has no location data attached. For this feature to work, enable location tags in the settings of your camera app and have location services enabled when taking photos
Location data can\'t be accessed. Please ensure location services are enabled, and refresh the list or restart the application
No data, enable location services and refresh
